title: Interpretation of a dream about eating boiled eggs for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: It also includes many benefits, especially when boiling eggs, and it should be noted that seeing boiled eggs in a dream can have many different meanings in general and for individuals in particular. However, the interpretation of seeing boiled eggs in a person’s dream may vary depending on the nature of the dream. This will be explained in the next article, so stay with us to find out together. Interpretation of a dream about eating boiled eggs for a single womanWhen he dreams of an unmarried woman, he eats boiled eggs. This may show that he has a good and honest personality. It also suggests that the upbringing in which he grew up is good and praiseworthy, Which contributes to helping everyone and doing good. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is eating boiled eggs, it may carry signs that indicate that she is exerting a lot of diligence in her work with the aim of reaching the highest position that is distinct from others. When she sees women alone in a dream, they are peeling boiled eggs. To eat. This may be a sign that he will fulfill more of the desires that he wanted so badly. It also indicates that he will obtain them in the near future, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees boiled eggs in large quantities in her home in a dream, this may mean that she will obtain goodness and blessings for herself and her friends. This house, God willing. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is eating boiled eggs. This can bring evidence of increased quality and ability to nourish. When an unmarried woman dreams of greedily eating boiled eggs. This is a sign that she will hear what makes her happy with good and happy news. In the near future. When you see boiled eggs in the kitchen in a single woman’s dream. It is evidence of the presence of goodness and blessings that the dreamer will enjoy. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating boiled eggs. This may indicate the progress of a good fiancé, which will be a reason for her joy. And her happiness. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating boiled eggs, this can be good news. It also indicates the approaching marriage if the marriage date is delayed. See also: Interpretation of dreams about eating eggs. Interpretation of dreams about buying eggs for unmarried women. When an unmarried woman sees In her dream that she is buying eggs, it may mean that it is good skin for her. When a single woman dreams that she is buying eggs and needs them. This may indicate that something of value will come to her. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying eggs, it may mean that food will come in Her way. When a single woman dreams that she is buying eggs. This is an indication that she is going through a very happy period and also indicates that useful money will come to her. Some believe that seeing a single woman in her dream is buying eggs. It may indicate that she will fall into some problems and crises through some actions. Which he did, and God knows best. Interpretation of boiled eggs for single people by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if an unmarried woman sees in her dream, boiled eggs on the table. It can refer to the girls present in her personal life. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is eating boiled eggs with their shells on. This Evidence that this

title: Interpretation of a dream about pimples on the body

preview.html: Dreaming of pimples on the body of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams. Pimples on the body in a dream are evidence of a feeling of psychological comfort and stability. As for seeing large pimples on the body with pus, it is evidence of undesirable things, including obtaining money through illegal means. As for seeing a large group of black pimples On the body and face, it is an indication that the dreamer is the one who commits many sins and disobedience, and he must stay away from them. Seeing pimples on the body according to Al-Nabulsi: Dreaming of seeing a body with many pimples and pimples is an indication of the abundant nutrition and abundance that the dreamer will gain. Dreaming of pimples on the palm of the hand in The dream is evidence of big profits and abundant money. Dream body pills for single women. An unmarried girl’s dream of pills spread all over her body, and this indicates her engagement in the near future, and if she is engaged, this vision indicates the approaching marriage. Seeing pills in a dream can mean that the girl You will reach a prestigious position at work or you will find a new, much better job. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream spreading pimples of pink color on her body, this indicates the presence of a person who admires her very much. Seeing pimples on the body of a married woman. A married woman, if she sees pimples And spots on her body, evidence that her husband loves her very much. If a married woman sees in her dream the appearance of red spots on her body, this is evidence of the wealth and goodness that she will acquire. The appearance of corns on a married woman’s feet in a dream indicates trust and a sense of security. Dreaming of pimples on a woman’s body Pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s dream of pimples appearing on the face is evidence of the health of the fetus. As for the dream of pimples appearing in different areas of the body, it is evidence of a safe pregnancy and easy delivery. Interpretation of pimples on a man’s body: If a man sees pimples on his body in a dream, this indicates that he is characterized by dignity. As for The appearance of a red pimple on the body is evidence of a serious pimple for a woman. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about flooding a house with water

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream for one girl. The girl who sees the house submerged in heavy water refers to this girl’s negligence in worship, obedience, and duties. Or the sinking of the house may be a warning to this girl about her relationship with a young man of bad morals and reputation, and she should be careful. Perhaps the sinking of the house is a warning to this girl about her relationship with a young man of bad morals and reputation, and she should be careful. In the dream of an unmarried woman, it is a sign of the many worries and sorrows that this girl will suffer from in the coming period. But if the girl sees that she has survived drowning, she will be able to get rid of the anguish and sadness that she was going through. The girl’s survival from drowning shows her liberation from a corrupt relationship in her life. It was causing her psychological problems and stress. Read also to find out: Interpretation of dreams about water in the house. Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her house is drowning in water, she will suffer from many marital problems in the coming days. Or it may be the house being flooded with water. It is a sign that she is exposed to some health problems or that she is suffering from a serious illness. Some commentators believe that the sinking and destruction of a married woman’s house indicates the death of the husband or one of the children. In the case of surviving drowning, it symbolizes getting rid of a problem or disaster that this woman was going through. Also, The vision of escaping from drowning indicates that this woman will reconcile with her husband and put an end to the problems in her life. Interpretation of a dream of flooding a house with water in a pregnant woman’s dream: If she is pregnant in the first months, then her house sinking indicates an incomplete pregnancy and miscarriage. If a pregnant woman’s house sinks in the first months Finally, this indicates that the time of childbirth is approaching and she must be prepared. Seeing the house sinking in a dream for a pregnant woman also symbolizes many problems and difficulties that the woman may go through during pregnancy. The pregnant woman may be suffocating as a result of the pressure and tension that controls her throughout the pregnancy and she does not feel With comfort. A pregnant woman who survives drowning usually indicates that the time of childbirth is approaching, and good news for that woman of an easy birth, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream for a divorced woman. In most cases, the divorced woman’s house has been flooded due to the divorce and the demolition of her house that she passed through, which Make her see this vision. Or a divorced woman drowning may be a sign that she will be exposed to debts and many financial problems in the near future. Also, seeing a divorced woman drowning in her house indicates her feeling of insecurity after her divorce. If a divorced woman survives her house sinking, she will be able to overcome difficult ordeals. Which she is going through, and begins a new phase in her life. The drowning of a divorced woman may be the result of her dissatisfaction with the life she is living. Read also in this topic: Interpretation of a dream about water flooding the house by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream for a man. The drowning of a married man’s house due to problems and disputes. The many problems between him and his wife. Also, seeing a man’s house sinking shows the many successive material losses that this man will suffer from, or the sinking of a man’s house may be a warning sign for this man against entering Fez.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone defecate in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream: Seeing a person defecating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It is one of the dreams that disgusts the dreamer. Interpretation scholars have disagreed with him in its interpretation, to the point that they have presented different interpretations related to it. This, and we find that it is possible for this dream to convey good news to the fortuneteller, as it can be a harbinger of evil depending on the circumstances he is going through in his life, in addition to the difference in the social position of the viewer and the person in question. The dream reflects what the person believes in his subconscious mind, and in our article we will shed light on the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing someone defecating in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing someone defecating in a dream There are many interpretations related to seeing feces in a dream, as the majority of interpretation scholars believe that it brings good news to the dreamer, It is one of the visions worthy of praise, contrary to what the dreamer believes, even though it is true. gross. In it, and in the following points, we show you some interpretations, such as: If a woman sees in her dream that feces are collected and placed in a bowl, this means that the dreamer in reality lives in a state of happiness, calm, and psychological stability. In addition to seeing feces in his dream, it can This indicates the extent of his research in reality, so that he works hard and successfully, in addition to this, this dream indicates that the dreamer is gaining real money and wealth through his hard work. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that someone is defecating, it may mean that this person He will get rid of his worries in the real world, which hinder him and prevent him from living his normal life. And God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of dreams about riding a plane with someone in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Muhammad Ibn Sirin is referred to as the most important interpreter of dreams, and he provided many interpretations related to seeing feces in a dream, and despite the fact It is disgusting to the dreamer, but it can be a good sign and bring good to him. . We present to you the most important interpretations contained: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is collecting feces in a bowl, this means that she may get married in the coming period. Likewise, if the dreamer sees in a dream that a child is defecating and that child is female, this may indicate the abundance of a good dreamer. , because the female in a dream is considered good and food for him. In addition to seeing the dreamer in his dream’s feces, and even that he was studying and a student at the study stage, this dream portends him success and success. After all, if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is defecating on the mountaintops, This means that in reality the dreamer does not hesitate to do anything to reach his goal, no matter how difficult it is. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a chair in a dream according to Nabulsi. In the context of discussing seeing feces in a dream, this carries many interpretations, which are basically good visions and signs. Al-Nabulsi pointed out different explanations and explanations, such as: Seeing feces in a dream indicates that the dreamer will reap the fruits of his efforts and work in the near future. Also, if the dreamer sees in his dream that he defecates with young feces

title: Interpretation of the dream of the name Maryam in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the name Maryam in a dream Interpretation of dreams is one of the ancient sciences from the time of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, as the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, was one of the two Sahih scholars. Dreamers.. In order to interpret dreams, there are some things that the interpreter must know so that he can interpret this vision correctly.. In the article, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about the name Maryam in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Maryam in a dream If we dream of the name Maryam in a dream, then we must We read a lot of Surat Maryam and the biography of Maryam because it contains a lesson and a sermon about the vision. The vision came to reassure the dreamer that God Almighty will reward whoever defends her.Interpretation of the name Maryam in a dreamInterpretation of the name Maryam has many meanings and interpretations regarding this dream, as the name Maryam indicates purity and chastity, and when a woman dreams of the name Maryam, this indicates her obedience to God Almighty. In language, it means a woman above modesty. Seeing Mary in a dream is interpreted as courtesy to the monarch. Likewise, seeing a pregnant woman named Mary in a dream indicates that her pregnancy is protected by Satan and that giving birth to a child is one of Mary’s attributes. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about my father hitting me in the face A dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the name Maryam in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretations that a dream with the name Maryam brings good news to the dreamer and his good reputation in reality, and an indication of the state of relief that will occur to the dreamer after he has gone through great difficulties and pain. There are other interpretations, some of which we will mention in this aspect of the article: If a fortuneteller sees the name Maryam in a dream, or someone calls the name Maryam during his work, this is a sign that he will obtain great livelihood and great material gains in the coming days. Likewise, seeing the monarch with the name Maryam written on paper in a dream and holding the paper on which the name is found, this is a sign of perseverance in remembrance, supplication, and obedience to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about the name Maryam in a dream Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a clock in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of the name Maryam in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen said in his interpretations about A person named Maryam dreamed in his dream that it was one of the names of a horse that indicates the horse that will return to the owner of the vision in reality. Ibn Shaheen said that the name Maryam is one of the great and beloved names of many people. If a man sees in a dream that he has married a woman named Maryam, this is evidence that he will be blessed with a good, pure, pious woman. Likewise, when a person sees the name Maryam in a dream, and commits a sin In his life, this is a sign of guiding him to the path of light and avoiding sin. Seeing the name Maryam in a dream means that he will give birth to a baby girl, and along with the dreamer he will be freed from worries and problems. Read also: Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the name Maryam in a dream for a single woman. Scholars and commentators have cited There are many interpretations that they agree on, and their interpretations have differed according to the situation that God is experiencing in his life. If an unmarried girl sees the name Maryam in a dream, this is evidence that her sorrows will end, her circumstances will change for the better, and her problems will end if...

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating olives for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about olives for a single woman. Olives in a dream. The song shows the good state of her condition. It also means fulfilling desires and striving to achieve goals. Green olives in a dream, for an unmarried woman, means that there is a man thinking of proposing to her. Pickled olives announce her marriage to a good man. Black olives indicate suffering. And the difficulties that she will face in her life. Whoever dreams of picking olives from the tree indicates that the date of her marriage is approaching and setting. As for the one who dreams of distributing olives, it shows that he is an ideal person who helps others and enjoys the love of others. The meaning of seeing olives for a married woman. A married woman who dreams of olives in a dream indicates that she enjoys the love of her husband. To her and his devotion. Green olives indicate that you hear the news of pregnancy after many years of infertility. Olives mean that she is blessed with her children and is happy with them. The olive fruit indicates the success of the children. Black olives indicate the status and elevation of her husband. Yellow olives mean that he is suffering from an illness, but it is a sign of recovery. Urgent, God willing. The meaning of a dream about olives according to Ibn Sirin. Black olives in a dream indicate food, kindness, and blessing. Yellow olives indicate illness, fatigue, misery, and trouble. A dream about an olive tree refers to a pure and righteous woman. It also indicates a man who is righteous to his family and his family. Olive leaves show good news. It is considered a vision The olive fruit is a sign of happiness and well-being. Dreaming of olive oil means treating illness. Interpretation of black olives in a dream for a man. Black olives in a man’s dream indicate a radical change in his professional life that will put him in a better position and receive a greater salary. A married man dreaming of black olives indicates that His wife is pregnant with a male child. The meaning of green olives in a dream for a man. Green olives in a sick person’s dream means recovery. It is also an indication of the collapse of problems and issues. It also indicates the pregnancy of a married woman and a pregnant girl. The meaning of a dream of distributing olives in a dream. A dream of distributing olives to the living or the dead indicates The dream indicates a good reputation, good morals, and the fortuneteller’s high status in his family and in society. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

It also means fulfilling desires and striving to achieve goals. Green olives in a dream, for an unmarried woman, means that there is a man thinking of proposing to her. Pickled olives announce her marriage to a good man. Black olives indicate suffering. And the difficulties that she will face in her life. Whoever dreams of picking olives from the tree indicates that the date of her marriage is approaching and setting. As for the one who dreams of distributing olives, it shows that he is an ideal person who helps others and enjoys the love of others. The meaning of seeing olives for a married woman. A married woman who dreams of olives in a dream indicates that she enjoys the love of her husband. To her and his devotion. Green olives indicate that you hear the news of pregnancy after many years of infertility. Olives mean that she is blessed with her children and is happy with them. The olive fruit indicates the success of the children. Black olives indicate the status and elevation of her husband. title: Interpretation of a dream about tiles in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream Tiles are considered one of the construction tools used for floors to protect and decorate them, and they are the basis for building houses, buildings and all facilities. A dream about seeing tiles in a dream is the interpretations of leading scholars and interpreters. We deal with it today by the scholar Ibn Sirin and Sheikh al-Nabulsi, for a single man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and an unmarried girl. Seeing tiles in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that furnished tiles in a dream are evidence of good food. He pointed out that this means a blessing in livelihood and earning a lot of money for the family. Who do you know? MarbleThe presence of tiles in the house in a dream is a bad omen because it portends a bad event for the pioneer. The meaning of seeing tiles in a dream For Al-Nabulsi: Sheikh Al-Nabulsi will say that seeing tiles inside is a necessary part in a dream that resembles a house, a sign of joy and optimism. It also indicates diet and new clothes. The meaning of seeing tiles in a dream for a man When a man dreams that he is walking in the house on unpaved ground, this is an indication of his weak physical condition. As for the one who sees that he is walking on a long road without Tiles, but it contains and builds. It is a sign of change for the better on his material level in reality. As for the person who removed the tiles from their place, this indicates his efforts and diligence in changing his life. If the torn tiles are made of cement, it indicates the death of indifference and sadness. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream for a young man A young man who suffers from circumstances Narrow tiles and the tiles come out in a dream and become crumbling marble. It indicates changing one’s life for the better and improving his life. As for whoever sees a paving stone and begins to lay it, this indicates a new life. It could be a wedding, a trip, or a new job. Who do you know? Tiles in black color symbolize an event and obstacles. And bad problems. Seeing cleaning tiles indicates safety and security. The meaning of seeing tiles in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman seeing new tiles is a sign of an easy birth. White squares symbolize the birth of a woman. Brown or black tiles show a newborn male. Green tiles mean livelihood to a large extent. Interpretation of seeing tiles in A dream for a married woman is seeing cleaning tiles. For a married woman, this indicates her effort and diligence to change life for the better. A dream about broken windows indicates wasting the husband’s money on useless matters. Seeing changing tiles symbolizes moving to a new place. Green floor tiles in her dream skin is good for pregnancy. The meaning of seeing tiles In a single woman’s dream, tiles in a single person’s dream mean love, intimacy, and understanding with family members. A dream about white tiles symbolizes purity, purity of heart, and purity of intention. Whoever sees dirty tiles symbolize sorrows and tension. Add the dream you want to interpret with reference to the family situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of dreams about charity for children, single and married women, and men according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about children’s charity: The Islamic religion came with many important religious teachings that distinguish Muslims from other heavenly religions, and there are many beautiful things that people do, and charity is one of the religious things that Muslims do, through which they show the extent of their religious commitment. Caring for people in need and charity does not stop at the young child, but extends to every needy person despite the age difference, and we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of charity for children.Interpretation of the dream of children’s charityCharity is one of the most beautiful and simple things that is given to different people, and through it they are helped. Which consists of the following: If the dreamer sees that he is involved in various charitable organizations, this indicates his love for both kindness, empathy, and compassion in dealing with others. When the dreamer sees that he is receiving some charity, this indicates that there is someone looking for him and that this person will be supportive of him. If the dreamer sees that he is giving a child charity, this indicates that there is a group of debts and tribulations awaiting him and he may have to ask for help from those around him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about giving a ring to a single and married man from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about charity for a single woman. An unmarried girl from social situations. Which concerns the female, and she is subject to a lot of thought, due to the delay in her marriage, and she is in a state of anxiety if her share does not come, and there are a group of explanations related to it, which are as follows: If the fortuneteller is from a family that raises different types of animals, this indicates that both of the number of Animals and the amount of meat she has will increase. If an unmarried girl sees herself doing a group of forbidden things, such as: eating pork, then this indicates the corruption of her soul and money, and she must review herself and work on the right and appropriate path for her. And if an unmarried woman is seen giving zakat to someone who is... He is known for corruption, so this indicates that this girl is as corrupt as he is, and they must both return to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about giving dead banknotes in a dream to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s charity. As we know that a married woman is one of the people who works most constantly to provide all The needs that both the husband and children want to ensure the stability of family life, and there are a number of interpretations for them, which are: It is related to the previous dream, which is depicted in the following: If a married woman sees that her husband gives her charity, this indicates the approaching date of pregnancy, and she will also be able to have children, God willing. If a married woman sees that one of her husband’s relatives is giving her alms, this indicates that her share of the inheritance will be taken. If a married woman gives alms for a large amount of money, this indicates that she will have a reason to turn many people close to her. Interpretation of a dream about giving alms for a pregnant woman: being exposed A pregnant woman experiences many stresses during pregnancy, which increase significantly as the due date approaches, for fear that the fetus will return to real life safely and securely. There are a number of explanations

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fat woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin said that seeing a fat woman in a dream indicates goodness and blessings that we will see in the coming years. Also, seeing a fat woman in a dream indicates the collapse of all the dreamer’s worries and conflicts, changing his principle for the better, and achieving what his heart desires. He said that this vision shows an abundance of sustenance and a rise in status to the highest positions, and indicates happiness, sustenance, prosperity and comfort. Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she looks thin and ugly, this may indicate the psychological comfort that she sees in reality. Also, seeing a fat woman in an unmarried girl’s dream means that her close friend will gain a lot of sustenance after its many meanings. Also, if a single girl sees a fat and fit woman, this indicates a life full of goodness, blessing and good news in reality. This vision also indicates a family meeting After a long separation between them and after a long period, it indicates a marriage contract for an unmarried girl. Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she has become very fat, this indicates the many differences between her and her husband and the end of their marital relationship. Also, seeing a fat woman in a dream For a married girl, it indicates disappointment, hope, and a lack of security and psychological comfort. But if she sees that her husband is holding the hand of a very fat woman, this indicates a lot of money, getting a new job, and getting a promotion in his job. Also, seeing a fat woman in a dream indicates the emergence of... Something unexpected in reality and moving from one residence to another new residence. Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has become very obese, this indicates the sins that she will see in her life. The same applies to seeing an obese woman if she is a pregnant relative. This indicates the ease of her birth, her high status, and the newborn. As for the interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a dream, it foretells the birth of a healthy child, free of all diseases, and it also predicts the nutrition he will receive. Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that his wife has become very obese. This indicates the lawful and abundant livelihood that he will earn from his trade. Also, if a single young man sees that his girlfriend or fiancée has become very obese in a dream, this means that he is entering a new job. If a man sees in a dream that he is attracted to a fat and beautiful girl, this indicates His closeness to this young man, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a fat girl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a fat girl in a dream, this indicates great wealth and a great source of livelihood that the dreamer will acquire. Also, seeing an unknown fat girl indicates many benefits, blessings and ease in all matters. If You saw someone you know who is fat in a dream, unlike in reality, this means that the dreamer will go through a period of distress and misery. Interpretation of Dreams I dreamed that I was fat in a dreamIf a girl sees someone who is fat

title: Interpretation of a dream about a trip to the Emirates

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to the Emirates on various occasions. Many people daydream and sleep about traveling to the Emirates, whether for work, to seek knowledge, for tourism, for entertainment, or to visit their relatives, but what does traveling to the Emirates mean in a dream for a single person or for another married person? How is the situation interpreted for a special person and does the dream have indications that the situation in terms of work has changed? We will learn this in detail in our next article on the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about travel: Many commentators indicate a change of state or a transition to a different stage. Ibn Sirin interprets travel in a dream by changing circumstances, finding a weak person, or following desires. Al-Nabulsi explains the journey by revealing people’s intentions and it can mean sincere repentance and turning away from committing sins. As for Gustav Miller, the Western translator, he interpreted seeing travel in a dream as an omen Good, as well as a desire for profit and happiness. He also adds that traveling on bumpy roads is a sign of enemies who want to cause you trouble. As for the journey on steep roads, it is a path that resembles gain and profit, and ends with hardship and loss. Miller adds that seeing the dreamer himself traveling alone means a good and fruitful trip, while traveling with friends means the appearance of people who add novelty to your life. Gustav Miller believes that travel can That it means inheritance and success in work, and that traveling means happiness and better conditions if it is for sunny and green roads.Interpretation of dreams about a trip to the Emirates for singlesDream interpreters say that a trip for singles to the Emirates indicates comfort and happiness and can also be interpreted as a desire to get married. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, a member of her family wants to marry her, and she will have good children from him if she marries him. Also, traveling to the Emirates as an individual shows her confidence in achieving her ambitions, despite the many consequences that she faces and that she will overcome. As for the car trip, it indicates progress in her life and that she will get an opportunity that she has always wanted. Also, preparing to travel to the Emirates indicates the need for single people to fear God in reality. I dreamed that I traveled to the Emirates. A dream about a trip to the Emirates is generally interpreted as a change in circumstances and being transported to The opposite. Traveling to Dubai, one of the United Arab Emirates, indicates that positive changes will happen quickly in the fortuneteller’s life, and that these things will also happen beautifully. Ibn Shaheen says that interpreting a trip without knowing whether the place is good or bad is evidence of the dreamer’s confusion in reality. And perhaps he is about to bid farewell to a family member. Ibn Shaheen adds that traveling towards the Qiblah is good, and adding it to food is even better. Ibn Shaheen also emphasizes the collapse of worries and doubts if the dreamer is close to God Almighty, but if the opposite is true, then the time for his reckoning for what he shortened must be approaching. As for a married woman who is barren or who has not yet given birth, she will give birth. As for a married woman who She packs her bag for a trip
